nodes.text: This unknown executive was the president of the second largest mining company on the planet Belthu. This president was a supporter of Warlord Zsinj and supplied him regularly with refined durasteel.

During Night Caller's visit to Belthu, the president informed a disguised Garik Loran that the next batch of durasteel was ready for taking. The location of the shipment was passed to New Republic Intelligence Service.
